trends: There has been one other sighting in North Ridgeville
There were no other sightings in North Ridgeville on or around April 12th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi had let the dog out to use the bathroom, when i noticed that my dog suddenly stopped in his tracks and started to look upwards in a easterly direction. i then looked in the general area that he was looking, and saw a small triangular \ chevron shaped object flying from the east, to the west. what struck me as strange about this object was that is was so small (less than 6 feet across), silent, had 3 light (one center and one at each end) and so very quick moving, as it seemed to be flying no more than 100 feet from the ground. if i hadn't noticed my dog looking for something, i certainly would have missed it! the object quickly flew directly over my house, at which time i lost sight of it. when i went to the other side of the house (a second, or two later), the object was nowhere to be found. i understand that it was early in the morning, but i had been awake for a few hours, so it wasn't because i was still not awake. it should also be noted that i regularly see aircraft flying in and out of cleveland hopkins airport, and this certainy did not belong with that group of commercial aircraft.
Summary: Fast moving, small, silent, chevron shaped UFO.
